nodes.text: The Phantom Affair, Part 2 was the sixth issue in the Star Wars: X-Wing Rogue Squadron series of comics. It was released on March 12, 1996 by Dark Horse Comics.

If Wedge Antilles can't persuade the alien Mrlssi to sell their cloaking device to the New Republic, the result could be disaster. And that's just what Wedge expects when he discovers that the negotiating party includes Loka Hask -- the pirate chieftain who killed Wedge's parents!
